title: SPICY 🌶 Lesbian Chat & Dating
description:
🌶 LESBIAN SINGLE CHAT
Do you want to meet new lesbian, queer or bisexual singles? It’s super simple with SPICY – the brand new chat and dating app to find your lesbian lover and homosexual women. Find out who you like, and YOU decide where to take it. We have over 50 million singles and more than 100,000 join every day. With the SPICY lesbian dating app, it's easy to spot a hot lady! We celebrate diversity and welcome all lesbian, bi and transgender (LGBTQ+) singles to join the party.
❤️ FIND LESBIAN LOVE
We present you with the most interesting women around you. In the match game, choose who you like and who you don’t. You only get messages from someone you like, and you decide who can start a conversation with you. In SPICY, you have full control and you won’t be bothered by unwanted visitors.
💪 YOU’RE ALWAYS IN CONTROL
Behind SPICY is a small team with a great mission: we want to make connecting more fun, safe and awesome for women to find lesbian love. Your exact location and your personal data remain secret. At SPICY, everyone is safe and anonymous.
💋 COMPLETELY FREE
SPICY is made for us women to find the right lady. Forget the traditional dating services, fee-based lesbian apps or complicated flirt chats. SPICY is new, different and game-changing to find your LGBTQ love.
Please send feedback or comments to:
android@spicy.love
Have a lot of fun and THANK YOU for your review :)
Cheers,
The Girls from SPICY
